mapper.update: update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phoneNo = #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createNo = #{createNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateNo = #{updateNo,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, username, password , email, phone_no, create_time, create_no, update_time, update_no, user_roles.roles_id from user LEFT JOIN user_roles on user.id = user_roles.user_id
